dmca.title: ABUSE] Case ID 57956216 - Notice of Claimed Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 7:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Case ID 57956216 - Notice of Claimed Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------

08:54:04 -0500

-0500
Received: from mail.bsa.org ([209.70.21.12])        by

(Exim) id 1DQ421-0000UY-Dt        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 25 Apr 2005
08:53:54 -0500

Microsoft        SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.211); Mon, 25 Apr 2005 09:53:05 -0400

Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.211); Mon, 25 Apr 2005 09:53:05 -0400
To: abuse@theplanet.com
From: Business Software Alliance <copyright@bsa.org>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; Boundary="--PTCP_000000030103b307d5"
Message-ID: <000000040103b407d5@[192.168.1.105]>
Date: Mon, 25 Apr 2005 09:53:04 -0400
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Apr 2005 13:53:05.0242 (UTC)
FILETIME=[1AC0A3A0:01C5499E]
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 209.70.21.12 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of bsa.org)        client-ip=209.70.21.12;
envelope-from=copyright@bsa.org;        helo=mail.bsa.org;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.7
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Case ID 57956216 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.9

Monday, April 25, 2005


RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the following copyrighted computer
program(s):

Adobe Acrobat
Adobe Photoshop
Macromedia Dreamweaver MX
Macromedia Flash
Microsoft Office XP Professional
Microsoft Windows
Norton Internet Security
Norton Ghost
Norton Systemworks

Dear Sir/Madam:

The Business Software Alliance (BSA) has determined that the website listed
below, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering
unlicensed copies or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to
copyrighted computer programs published by the BSA's member companies.

Infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):
http://kime.slew.org/databin


The above computer program(s) is/are being made available for copying,
through downloading, at the above location without authorization from the
copyright owner(s).

Based upon BSA's representation of the copyright owners in anti-piracy
matters, we have a good faith belief that none of the materials or
activities listed above have been authorized by the rightholders, their
agents, or the law.  BSA represents that the information in this
notification is accurate and states, under penalty of perjury, that it is
authorized to act in this matter on behalf of the copyright owners listed
above.

We are giving notice of these activities pursuant to Section 512 of Title 17
of the U.S. Code (as enacted by the 'Online Copyright Infringement Liability
Limitation Act').  We expect that you will take expeditious action to remove
or disable access to the materials described above, and thereby prevent the
illegal reproduction and distribution of pirated software via your company's
network. As you know, illegal on-line activities can result in 50 million
people on the Internet accessing and downloading a copyrighted product
worldwide without authorization - a highly damaging activity for the
copyright holder.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take.

Please include the following CaseID in any response you send: Case ID
57956216

Yours sincerely,


John R. Wolfe
Manager of Investigations
Business Software Alliance
1150 18th St NW Suite 700
Washington, DC 20036
URL: http://www.bsa.org
E-mail: copyright@bsa.org
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCbY+XvK/XpJs6oyURAjmSAJ92/mGleORw3O1HdciEUy3BkhoquACdFLRL

=f4n1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
